sentence: My husband and I live close to Cincinnati and this is one of our favorite romantic getaways
Took my wife there with the weekend getaway package
My parents have stayed there to celebrate special occasions and have always enjoyed their time there
We enjoyed the sitting area near the bar to talk with family and an old friend

I love this place the only place I will stay when I am in Cincinnati they treat you like you are one of the family as I pull up to valet am not no my name from ballet all the way down to housekeeping is like going to cheers and everyone knows Norm the restaurant is very clean the menu is very interesting very diverse the bar is exciting if you have a indoor atrium which is the center of the hotel open your window or your balcony door and listen to the music that is being played live very nice very clean I love this place and the staff
The lobby was beautifully decorated for the holiday season and the employees were all kind and professional

Whenever I stay in Cincinnati I try to stay at the Cincinnati it is very nice it is a historical building the rooms are remodeled everything is always clean they treat you as if you are part of their family room service the host the bartenders the restaurant it is clean inside and out no complains at all you would love it kind of pricey but it is worth it
Celebrated our anniversary with a weekend getaway
Quick Business Trip
Clean comfy good for family
I will never stay at this hotel again and I will never stay at a property owned by this parent company again
Found one at a holiday inn 20 miles away
If you all want to spend your hard earned money on a good getaway do not do it here

Would NOT recommend for a family with children as the old building has open stairwell railings that are extremely low and could present extreme danger for small childrenand any adult not paying attention for that matter
While then issues are small they add up and it is not something you want to have to deal with on vacation
Hotel was under construction during our stay but we spent our trip in one of the newly renovated rooms
We were given a free nights stay coupon for our terrible trip last year while they was remodeling
On a working trip we were not there to be pampered
Bar Restaurant I was going to post a review separately for Brick and Mortar but could not find them listed on Trip Advisor
After checking in our group went to the bar for a few drinks
With no one in the bar area my group ordered a burger and some appetizers 25 minutes later and no food we asked to cancel the order 10 minutes later the food arrives
When my family of four arrived at the front desk the staff member informed us that because we booked through HotWire our bed type could not be guaranteed
Cincinatian Hotel business trip
